PODCAST: Now For Something Completely Different...Comedy In Games  Forbes Now

Listen to the full episode here: What’s the secret to comedy in video games? That’s not the set-up to a joke, it’s an actual question. Games function differently than other forms of media, so it figures comedy would as well. Grim Fandango, The Stanley Parable, Portal, Grand Theft Auto V all approach the form differently, but how does interaction factor into the jokes? Satchell Drakes and I discuss the challenges of translating comedy to an interactive medium and speak with William Pugh, the game designer behind The Stanley Parable and Accounting, as well as a GDC speaker on the subject.
